title.oldValue: Microsoft Teams: Unified user experience for Bookings App in Teams
title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Updates to Bookings app experience in Teams

description.oldValue:
The Bookings app in Teams is moving to the new
Virtual Appointments app and users will see a unified Bookings app experience
across all the entry points. Users will be able to access features targeted for
virtual appointments scenarios via the new Virtual Appointments app.
description.newValue: The Bookings app in Teams will be updated to match the web version on https://book.ms, ensuring consistent features across all entry points. The current experience in Bookings app in teams is available in the new Virtual appointments app. With this update, features such as Queue, Forms integration & scheduler-initiated SMS reminders for appointments that are available in Bookings app in Teams will be available only on the new Virtual appointments app on Teams.
